description: This is the debut CD from one of today's best comedians. Brian has been on Letterman 5 times, he did the Tonight Show with Johnny Carson, and he had his own comedy special on Showtime called Something's Wrong with the Regan Boy. This CD features all his favorite routines including "School Routine," "Little League Baseball," "Putting His Foot in His Mouth" and more.
